授業目的: The purpose of this lecture is to study about Aid-for-Trade(AfT), which has characterized contemporary aid policy for donor countries in recent years. Focused questions in this lecture are: (i) Why had AfT initiative emerged?, (ii) What are characteristics of AfT?, (iii) Is AfT effective?, and (iv) What is cutting-edge research agenda on AfT? To understand AfT deeply, basic knowledges and concepts in development economics are needed. This lecture also deals with some relevant topics such as economic development, international trade, and foreign aid.
到達目標:
(1) Students deeply understand Aid-for-Trade (AfT) initiative.
(2) Students are able to discuss the pros and cons over AfT.
(3) Students understand the basic knowledges on economic development, international trade, and foreign aid.
